a.span: Lake Region Union High School District
VT Online Licensing System for Educators

br.font: All of our students will have choices for success throughout their lives.

It is the mission of the Orleans Central Supervisory Union to provide an environment that celebrates diversity and creativity, promotes inclusion and integrity, and partners with parents and community members to give students access to a 21st century education.
Our Districts (as of 7/1/2019):
​Lake Region Union Elementary-Middle School District
Lake Region Union High School District

strong.font: Meal Service for all OCSU families during the COVID-19 school closure

td.div:
Lunch pick-up is available from 11:00-1:00 at the following locations:
Albany Community School at the kitchen door at the front corner of the building.
Barton Graded School at the gymnasium entrance.
Brownington Central School at the main entrance.
Glover Community School at the front gymnasium entrance.
Irasburg Village School at the main entrance.
Orleans Elementary School at the side entrance by the parking lot.
When you arrive at your pick up location please pay attention to the signs and attendants on duty for instructions on the pick up process so that we maintain social distancing. Please do not come to the door and attempt to enter the building.
If you did not pre-register for meals, you can still go to a site and they should be able to accommodate your needs.
To see the menu, click here.
